channel.title: Offset Baseline hazard on Missing Data Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Offset Baseline hazard on Missing Data Solutions

item.title: Offset procedure of Cox model and baseline hazard function
item.description: This post is about the offset procedure of the Cox model and the influence on the baseline hazard after shrinkage of the coefficients. This seems straightforward to apply like with the logistic regression model but some caveats remain. These will be unraveled here.
